episode_event_general_ch0115_00_denji/67:
Aha... Your Thunderbolt may be just the thing to
reignite that fire of his.

Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ], would you mind
helping me with something? I’m in a bit of a bind
right now.
Come find me when you’re ready.
episode_event_general_ch0115_00_denji/42:
With a Thunderbolt that
powerful, just maybe...

I’d be very grateful for your help. I’m counting
on you!
